column5: When I was at the spring fishing show there was a guy there who makes and sells fishfinder mounts machined out of solid aluminum... An ode to the Balzout mounts made and sold in the US.Well I cant find his card... does anyone know who i'm talking about? I would love one of his mounts in lieu of the standard RAM offering.TIA.
Maybe this https://geigertec.com/ Wow, thank you!   That is the one
